SELECT get_codename(posting_status) as posting_status_nm , p.co_name , work_region , get_codename(work_region) as work_region_nm , start_date , end_date , job , age , get_codename(gender) as gender_nm , get_codename(emp_type) as emp_type_nm , work_day , worktime_start , worktime_end , sal , party , work_content , pri_content , etc_content , posting_no , c.co_user_no , posting_title FROM company_user c JOIN posting p ON c.co_user_no = p.co_user_no WHERE posting_no = #{postingNo}

SELECT NVL(MAX(posting_no), 100) + 1 FROM posting
INSERT INTO posting ( co_name, work_region, start_date, end_date, job, age, gender, emp_type, work_day, worktime_start, worktime_end, sal, party, work_content, pri_content, etc_content, posting_no, co_user_no, posting_title ) VALUES ( #{coName}, #{workRegion}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{job}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{empType}, #{workDay}, #{workTimeStart}, #{workTimeEnd}, #{sal}, #{party}, #{workContent}, #{priContent}, #{etcContent}, #{postingNo}, #{coUserNo}, #{postingTitle} )
